content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Girona 2.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Girona 2.
Attempt blocked. Verza (Almería) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Henok Goitom with a headed pass.
Goal!  Almería 2, Girona 2. Moha (Girona) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Nieto following a fast break.
Substitution, Almería. Ortiz Bernal replaces Aleix Vidal.
Attempt missed. Henok Goitom (Almería) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right following a fast break.
Attempt saved. Verza (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Fernando Soriano (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
Henok Goitom (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luso (Girona).
Míchel Macedo (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
Rafita (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Albert Dorca (Girona).

Dangerous play by Benja (Girona).
Aleix Vidal (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Substitution, Almería. Henok Goitom replaces Leonardo Ulloa.
